  • Constructor Details

    • BulletSpawner

      public BulletSpawner(long intervalInMs, com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D coordinate2D, Tower shootingTower, GameScreen gameScreen)
      This spawns a bullet every certain amount of milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      long intervalInMs: this is the amount of milliseconds it has to wait to spawn another bullet.
      Coordinate2D coordinate2D: this is the coordinates on which the bullet spawns.
      Tower shootingTower: this is the Tower entity from which the bullet shoots.
      GameScreen gameScreen: this is the scene in which the bullet is visible.

  • Method Details

    • spawnEntities

      protected void spawnEntities()
      This method spawns a bullet if there's an enemy within the range.
      Specified by:

    • setShootAngle

      public void setShootAngle(double shootAngle)
      This method sets the angle in degrees to the enemy that the bullet is shooting.
      Parameters:
      double shootAngle: this is the shootAngle in degrees that replaces the old shootAngle.
      Specified by:
      setShootAngle in class ProjectileSpawner

    • setNeedToShoot

      Parameters:
      boolean shootNeed: the boolean needToShoot changes into this parameter.

    • shoot

      public void shoot(double shootAngle)
      This method makes it possible for a bullet to shoot and do so in the right direction.
      Parameters:
      double shootAngle: this is the shootAngle that needs to be set.
